tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dna_sequences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence VARCHAR(255),
  mutation_detected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence_id INT,
    mutation_type TEXT,
    mutation_position INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id) REFERENCES dna_sequences(id)
);
CREATE TABLE DNA_Sequence (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sequence TEXT NOT NULL, gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, mutation_type VARCHAR(20));
CREATE TABLE Gene_Mutation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, mutation_description TEXT NOT NULL, mutation_category VARCHAR(30));
CREATE TABLE Mutation_Analysis_Result (id INT PRIMARY KEY, analysis_date DATE NOT NULL, mutation_detected BOOLEAN NOT NULL, confidence_level DECIMAL(5,2));
CREATE TABLE Sequence_Annotation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sequence_id INT NOT NULL, annotation_text TEXT NOT NULL, annotation_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Mutation_Category (id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, category_description TEXT);
